alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 4:43AM AKST until December 22 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Reduced visibilities to as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Through 9 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A warm front will move into the Southwest coast through the morning hours, eventually reaching the Lower Kuskokwim Valley later this afternoon. Ahead of the front, snow has already transitioned into a mix of rain and freezing rain across the Kuskokwim Delta as temperatures gradually warm. Minor ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch will be possible before precipitation finally tapers off later this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
